name: get_3_fluctuation_endpoint
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool currenciesexchangerateapi.
Tool description: CurrenciesRatesAPI is a RESTful API that provides currency conversion and exchange rate information.This API is organized around REST. Our API has predictable resource-oriented URLs, accepts form-encoded request bodies, returns JSON-encoded responses.
API description: Request Parameters:
'start_date': 
'end_date': 
'base': 
'symbols': 
Response: This endpoint returns the percentage change in the exchange rates of the specified currencies over the specified time period in JSON format.

end_date.description: The end date for the time period of the fluctuation data.

base.description: The base currency for which the fluctuation data is to be retrieved.

start_date.description: The start date for the time period of the fluctuation data.

symbols.description: Specific currencies for which the fluctuation data is to be retrieved. Defaults to 'usd'.
